Description: Hugo Boss 1513238 Chronograph Bracelet Strap 3-Hand Quartz WatchDescription This polished watch by BOSS Orange is crafted with a stainless steel case and strap. The textured dial features three-eye quartz chronograph movement and subtle logo detail in bold, statement making orange. A true wardrobe essential. Details Stainless steel case measuring 47 mm (1.9 in.) Stainless steel bracelet strap Logo detail on sunray dial 3-eye quartz movement Water resistant: 3 ATM (33 feet) Two-year limited warranty Size and Fit The model wears size One Size and has a height of 6'1" , bust of 38", waist of 32" and a hip of 38" .
